description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) uses NirSoft tools to steal user credentials from the infected machine.(Citation: Ensilo Darkgate 2018) NirSoft tools are executed via process hollowing in a newly-created instance of vbc.exe or regasm.exe.

external_references.description: Adi Zeligson & Rotem Kerner. (2018, November 13). Enter The DarkGate - New Cryptocurrency Mining and Ransomware Campaign. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
